channel.title: Can't connect to my local server?
channel.description:
I've been trying to play on the server on this thread:
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=459671.0
It's a 525 server, so anyway I edited this line in my client.java to connect to a local server because when I originally extracted it it looked like a no-ip host address:
Class68_Sub9.aString2883 = "0.0.0.0";
I have also tried replacing 0.0.0.0 with 127.0.0.1 and also no luck.
If you want to look at the whole client.java, here is the link:
http://pastebin.com/vhU0aVDE
I get the error: error_game_js5connect whenever I try to launch the client.
Any help is appreciated, thank you

item.title: Can't connect to my local server?
item.dc:creator: @Crazyjackson78 Crazyjackson78
item.description:
@Crazyjackson78 wrote:

I’ve been trying to play on the server on this thread:

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

It’s a 525 server, so anyway I edited this line in my client.java to connect to a local server because when I originally extracted it it looked like a no-ip host address:

Class68_Sub9.aString2883 = “0.0.0.0”;

I have also tried replacing 0.0.0.0 with 127.0.0.1 and also no luck.

If you want to look at the whole client.java, here is the link:

http://pastebin.com/vhU0aVDE

I get the error: error_game_js5connect whenever I try to launch the client.

Any help is appreciated, thank you
